pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, May 19, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Vietnam, Phan Minh Chinh.

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Bill Blair, Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna, and Mayor of Toronto John Tory, will discuss recent investments in public transportation while virtually visiting the Scarborough Subway System Extension project.

Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Guildwood John McKay, Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Agincourt Jean Yip, Member of Parliament for Scarborough Centre Salma Zahid, Member of Parliament for Scarborough—Rouge Park Gary Anandasangaree, and Member of Parliament for Scarborough North Shaun Chen will also be in attendance.

The event will be streamed live on the Prime Minister’s official Twitter account: https://twitter.com/CanadianPM

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an Instagram Live with Today’s Parent to discuss support for families.

The event will be streamed live on the Instagram account of Today’s Parent: https://www.instagram.com/todaysparent
